title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: cotton on cardboard
Technique: resist printed on plain weave; floral sprays printed by roller within resist area; immersion dyed for blue
inscribed: Drawing of mark on cardboard. "Grants Brothers MANUFACTURERS & PRINTERS RAMSBOTTOM LANCASHIRE" "06 B" and "H S".
dimensions:
Fabric: Warp: 17.5cm (7in.). Weft: 32cm (12 1/2in.). Left selvedge present. Fabric on cardboard. Height:26.5 cm. (10 1/2in.). Width: 34.5cm (13 1/2in.)
Pattern: Height: 14cm (5 1/2in.). Width not present.
description: Fabric pasted to cardboard containing a drawing of the mark. The fabric has a design of floral sprays in read, grey and natural on a blue background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment.
Medium: cotton on cardboard
Technique: resist printed on plain weave; floral sprays printed by roller within resist area; immersion dyed for blue. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-28.
